content: mini christmas gift bag mosaic overlay crochet pattern the perfect mini gift bag for small things like jewellery gift cards sweets etc it is a beginner friendly mosaic design as there are no special stitches just single_crochet and double_crochet combined with some regular crochet to finish the project the mosaic section is 25 stitches which are repeated twice pattern contains written instructions and a chart included are instructions on mosaic overlay techniques and chart reading if this is your first mosaic project you will find many youtube videos if you need further help search for beginners guide to mosaic crochet when choosing yarn it is important to choose contrasting colours so the pattern stands out the designs in my pattern christmas mug rugs are the same size as the mosaic section of this design so they can easily be used for mini gift bags https //ravel me/mosaic-christmas-mug-rugs https //loopyskeins etsy com/listing/1563764066 © copyright carolannecreates 2024
